overview: Take a trip to paradise without ever leaving home with this dance-worthy compilation of music videos from some of tropical music's biggest names, including José Feliciano, Héctor Acosta and El Chaval. Tracks include "No Es una Novela" by Monchy y Alexandra, "Me Liberé" by Rafely Rosario, "Shorty Shorty" by Xtreme, "Ya No Llores" by Baby Boy, "Quedé Sólo en la Pobreza" by Kiko Rodríguez and many more.
title: All Tropical Hits
